text: Mohammed Abubakari (born 15 February 1986 in Kumasi) is a Ghanaian footballer who plays for Helsingborgs IF in Allsvenskan as a midfielder. ==Career== Abubakari previously played for Fetteh Football Academy in Ghana and for Dutch side Feyenoord.Player Profile : Mohammed Abubakari on www.ghanaweb.com Abubakari became the first player who moved from Ghanaian farmer team Feyenoord Academy to the Dutch side Feyenoord on 17 February 2006.Feyenoord signs Abubakari on www.modernghana.com After just eighteen months he left Feyenoord for Greece and promoted club Panserraikos FC signed him on a two- year deal until 30 June 2009.Abubakari in promotion joy in Greece on www.ghanasoccernet.com On May 4, 2009 he agreed to join PAOK F.C. on a free transfer signing a 4-year contract. He was on loan to Panserraikos F.C. until December 2010. In 2012, he moved to the Swedish Allsvenskan club Åtvidabergs FF. After three seasons he left lower-side Åtvidabergs FF. Abubakari moved to Allsvenskan team BK Häcken in January 2015 as a free agent. http://www.aftonbladet.se/sportbladet/fotboll/sverige/allsvenskan/hacken/article19924174.ab Ahead of the 2018 season, Abubakari signed a three year-deal (with an option for a further) with Helsingborgs IF in Superettan. ==References== ==External links== * Stats & Profile on futbol.pl Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Feyenoord players Category:Panserraikos F.C. players Category:PAOK FC players Category:AE Larissa FC players Category:Doxa Drama F.C. players Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Sportspeople from Kumasi Category:West African Football Academy players Category:Åtvidabergs FF players Category:BK Häcken players Category:Helsingborgs IF players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Superettan players Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mohammed Abubakari
